Desc.eng: By the Emperor! Is this a real vox broadcast? Or are you only a figment of my imagination after the decades of solitude?
I will take care of the problem.
When I find the time, I will return.
[ff4a64a7][Mission info][/ff4a64a7]
A large group “vermin” - heretical void nomads - have taken up residence in one of the vaults of the repository. This is a straight up cleansing operation.
<BACK>
You have eliminated the vermin. Praise be! We seem to have a new problem, though. The sensors show intruders in the eastern wing, looting the stacks.
A rogue Astra Militarum warband is looting in the repository, doubtlessly looking for weapons. They must be stopped without too much collateral damage.
I am an agent of the Inquisition and I demand to know who you are, or there will be consequences.
Did you kill those invaders, Inquisitor? I hope that the sacred scrolls were not damaged... Now there is just the matter of the Onyx Gate.
Elaborate.

It is an alien artifact, stored in the special vault by the agents of the Inquisition. The Drukhari used it to stage raiding campaigns from time to time, I believe, and as it turns out, it is still active. I’m yearning to catalogue the contents of the vault, but I dare not approach until the Dark Eldar has been dealt with.
The Drukhari use a forgotten Webway gate in the repository to launch realspace raids. They must be dealt with.
Welcome, Inquisitor. Have you come to cleanse the repository?
My hallucinations are usually not this intimidating. You must be real then.
So who would you be?
Excellent news, Inquisitor! I shall begin cataloguing the special vault immediately. I can also provide access to the inventory of the repository at a discount price.
Do you really want to sell artifacts to me?

My last standing orders, which I received 273 standard years and 47 days ago, are to catalogue and maintain this repository as well as acquiring funds for the upkeep of this station by means of trade.
Welcome! Did you come to trade?
Show me your inventory.
See you later.
I am Korvid-509-Theta. I have been entrusted with the care and maintenance of this repository, Administratum Storage-annexe HS-1011.
Thanks for shopping!
What sort of repository is this?
A universal repository, storing codexes, scrolls, paraphernalia and artifacts.
In the name of the Emperor, I require access to the repository and its contents.
Certainly, Inquisitor. However, some sections have been infested by vermin and I’m afraid I haven’t been able to get rid of them. I humbly ask you to deal with them.
